ABOUT.desc1: Vinu is an organization dedicated to building the crypto ecosystem and our mission is to make the most optimistic contribution to the development of cryptocurrency by providing turnkey technology services and customized solutions. Cryptocurrency exchange solutions are at the forefront of our expertise. A team suitable for your project is assigned and we work to find the most suitable solution for you.
ABOUT.desc2: Cryptocurrency Exchange Platform Software is designed to disrupt the industry and give our clients a competitive advantage. Our Cryptocurrency Exchange solution easily outperforms, thanks to our 6 years of experience and source code. The Cryptocurrency Exchange solution is highly secure, scalable and customizable. The solution also includes advanced security and integrations for KYC/AML, customer support, CRM, accounting, geofencing and more. We provide built-in support for +500 tokens and coins. All you need to do to get all these and your own cryptocurrency exchange is to contact Vinu.
